name: Levelmancer
description:
"You are a new Levelmancer; Your job is to create a level! You aren't alone, though. While you build, you'll be visited by a wide variety of characters who might want to lend you a hand."

This represents an extremely early version of the game. Anything and everything is subject to change. Right now, it's a creative, sandbox-style toy with a small amount of building elements you can use to create an interesting world.

Planned upcoming features

  • In-game instructions/tutorial
  • Save/Load
  • Level sharing
  • Building themes
  • An item shop
  • Material gathering
  • Crafting
  • Characters, characters, characters!
  • Hundreds of items!
